extendedInfo.description: Beautiful and minimalistic Circle UCCW skin with an elegant look.Features :-1. Circle clock with battery percentage. (1st screenshot)2. Circle clock with current temperature. (2nd screenshot) [Donate Version Only]2. Circle clock with battery ring (3rd screenshot) [Donate Version Only]3. Circle clock without battery info. (4th screenshot) [Donate Version Only]4. Hotspots with customization ability. [Donate Version Only]Supported Customization :-- Ability to change time format from 12 hrs to 24 hrs. ( Hotspot mode should be turned off )Steps to add skin/ theme to homescreen:1) Long press home screen, select widget, select uccw and select UCCW 4x2.2) Pick this skin from the list.3) Touch the hand icon when it appears and wait for a few seconds.For full customization options and clock types, check out the donate version of this app " Circle UCCW Skin Donate"If you like this widget then do rate us 5 stars and don't forget to check out our other apps.For any questions/comments/ideas, please email me at themezilla@gmail.com

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I\'ve been looking for. All the information I need in one beautiful design.
reviews.author: Joyce Tan

reviews.title: Great look!!
reviews.comment: Can you please add three hotspots?? Thanks
reviews.author: Ameen Fadag

reviews.title: Can\'t change temp
reviews.comment: Great minimalist look. Love the grey but would be nice to have other colour options. Also wish I could change the temp from Fahrenheit to Celcius.
reviews.author: Zayaan Schroeder Mollagee

reviews.title: Awesome !!!
reviews.comment: Awesome theme... Keep it up dev ..
reviews.author: Sandip Soni
